md:
giải nghĩa từ "precision" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Precision** (noun)

* Meaning: The quality, condition, or fact of being precise; exactness.
* Vietnamese: Độ chính xác, Độ tinh tế.

Example sentence: The precision of the machine is essential for the production of high-quality products.

* Related words: Accuracy, exactness, correctness, meticulousness.

Note: In Vietnamese, "độ chính xác" is a more common translation of "precision", while "độ tinh tế" is more related to the concept of "delicacy" or "refinement".

Precision (noun)

  • Meaning: The quality, condition, or fact of being precise; exactness.
  • Vietnamese: Độ chính xác, Độ tinh tế.

Example sentence: The precision of the machine is essential for the production of high-quality products.

  • Related words: Accuracy, exactness, correctness, meticulousness.

Note: In Vietnamese, "độ chính xác" is a more common translation of "precision", while "độ tinh tế" is more related to the concept of "delicacy" or "refinement".
